Use a higher than normal value to ensure completely rounded edges when

settings.label: Cart

settings.content: See [currency formatting options](https://help.shopify.com/manual/payment-settings/currency-formatting) and [money filters](https://help.shopify.com/themes/liquid/filters/money-filters) for more details

settings.label: clientId
settings.info: Required. Your API client id from Instagram.

settings.label: accessToken
settings.info: A valid oAuth token. Can be used in place of a client ID.

settings.label: Get
settings.info: Customize what Instafeed fetches.

options.label: Popular - Images from the popular page.
Tagged - Images with a specific tag. Use tagName to specify the tag.
Location - Images from a location. Use locationId to specify the location.
User - Images with a user. Use userId to specify the user.

settings.label: tagName
settings.info: Name of the tag to get. Use with get: 'tagged'.

settings.label: locationId
settings.info: Unique id of a location to get. Use with get: 'location'.

settings.label: userId
settings.info: Unique id of a user to get. Use with get: 'user'.

settings.label: Resolution
settings.info: Size of the images to get.

settings.label: Limit
settings.info: Maximum number of Images to add.

settings.content: See [slick documentation](https://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/) for information about the possible options

settings.label: With Aspect Ratio
settings.info: Use aspect ratio for the images

settings.label: Accessibility
settings.info: Enables tabbing and arrow key navigation

settings.label: Adaptive Height
settings.info: Enables adaptive height for single slide horizontal carousels

settings.label: Autoplay
settings.info: Enables Autoplay

settings.label: Autoplay Speed
settings.info: Autoplay Speed in milliseconds

settings.label: Arrows
settings.info: Prev/Next Arrows

settings.label: Center Mode
settings.info: Enables centered view with partial prev/next slides. Use with odd numbered slidesToShow counts

settings.label: Center Padding
settings.info: Side padding when in center mode (px or %)

settings.label: CCS Ease
settings.info: CSS3 Animation Easing

settings.label: Dots
settings.info: Show dot indicators

settings.label: Draggable
settings.info: Enable mouse dragging

settings.label: Fade
settings.info: Enable fade

settings.label: Focus On Select
settings.info: Enable focus on selected element (click)

settings.label: Easing
settings.info: Add easing for jQuery animate. Use with easing libraries or default easing methods

settings.label: edgeFriction
settings.info: Resistance when swiping edges of non-infinite carousels

settings.label: Infinite
settings.info: Infinite loop sliding

settings.label: Initial Slide
settings.info: Slide to start on

settings.label: Lazy Load
settings.info: Set lazy loading technique. Accepts 'ondemand' or 'progressive'

settings.label: Mobile First
settings.info: Responsive settings use mobile first calculation

settings.label: Pause On Focus
settings.info: Pause Autoplay On Focus

settings.label: Pause On Hover
settings.info: Pause Autoplay On Hover

settings.label: Pause On Dots Hover
settings.info: Pause Autoplay when a dot is hovered

settings.label: Rows
settings.info: Setting this to more than 1 initializes grid mode. Use slidesPerRow to set how many slides should be in each row

settings.label: Slides Per Row
settings.info: With grid mode intialized via the rows option, this sets how many slides are in each grid row

settings.label: Slides To Show
settings.info: Number of slides to show
Number of slides to scroll
settings.label: Slides To Scroll

settings.info: Slide/Fade animation speed
settings.label: Speed
Swipe
settings.info: Enable swiping

settings.label: Swipe To Slide
settings.info: Allow users to drag or swipe directly to a slide irrespective of slidesToScroll

settings.label: Touch Move
settings.info: Enable slide motion with touch

settings.label: Touch Threshold
settings.info: To advance slides, the user must swipe a length of (1/touchThreshold) * the width of the slider

settings.label: Use CSS
settings.info: Enable/Disable CSS Transitions

settings.label: Use Transform
settings.info: Enable/Disable CSS Transforms

settings.label: Variable Width
settings.info: Variable width slides

settings.label: Vertical
settings.info: Vertical slide mode

settings.label: verticalSwiping
settings.info: Vertical swipe mode

settings.label: right-to-left
settings.info: Change the slider's direction to become right-to-left

settings.label: Wait For Animate
settings.info: Ignores requests to advance the slide while animating
